alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 4:28PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Otero, northwestern Prowers, northwestern Baca, northeastern Las Animas and southern Bent Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 428 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Higbee, or 14 miles south of North La Junta, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Higbee around 440 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
